alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Columbus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 9:13PM EDT until May 16 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Brunswick County in southeastern North Carolina... Central Columbus County in southeastern North Carolina... East central Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 913 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Redbug to near Loris, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Loris, Bethel, Lake Waccamaw, Freeland, Honey Island, Nakina, Old Dock, Mollie, Exum, Bughill, Freeman, Pireway, Dulah, Ash, Goretown, Delco, Crusoe Island, Bolton and Loris Community Hospital. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
